junit.runner
Class UnixShellDifferencer

java.lang.Object
  junit.runner.Differencer
      junit.runner.UnixShellDifferencer

public class UnixShellDifferencer
extends Differencer

An implementation of Differencer which uses the Unix command 'cmp -s' to diff the two files. Naturally this implementation is platform dependent.

Version:
10/08/2003
Author:
Alex Kinneer

Constructor Summary
UnixShellDifferencer()
          Constructs a UnixShellDifferencer.
UnixShellDifferencer(java.lang.String compDir)
          Constructs a UnixShellDifferencer, which uses the specified directory as the target for differencing.
 
Method Summary
 boolean diff(java.lang.String fName)
          Diff two files and return true if they are different, using the directory given in the constructor to locate target files for diffing.
 boolean diff(java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String compDir)
          Diffs a file against a file of the same name in the given directory and returns true if the files are different.

Method Detail

diff

public boolean diff(java.lang.String fName,
                    java.lang.String compDir)
Diffs a file against a file of the same name in the given directory and returns true if the files are different.

Specified by:
diff in class Differencer
Parameters:
fName - Name of the file to be differenced.
compDir - Path to the directory containing the other version of the file to be diffed against.
Returns:
true if the files are different, false if they are the same.

diff

public boolean diff(java.lang.String fName)
             throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Diff two files and return true if they are different, using the directory given in the constructor to locate target files for diffing.

Overrides:
diff in class Differencer
Parameters:
fName - Name of the file to be diffed.
Returns:
true if the files are different, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If this differencer was created using the no-argument constructor.
